title: Requesting discussion with riot staff specializing in matchmaking system
body:
I would like to personally contact a staff member about particular issues relating to matchmaking that could be fixed.

I am on all the time so feel free to contact me whenever is suitable.

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body:
Might want to try the Misc. boards for this. Reds usually hang out there.

Best of luck getting one, man.
